level.heading: Smoking at abatement sites.
level.text: ยง 24-150.1 Smoking at abatement sites. (a) Smoking shall not be permitted on any floor of a building where abatement activities, as defined in the rules of the department relating to asbestos control, are taking place. (b) Tobacco shall not be permitted inside the work place, as such area is defined in the rules of the department relating to asbestos control. (c) Lighters and matches shall not be permitted in the work place, as such area is defined in the rules of the department relating to asbestos control.
